title: [K-12] Improving Science Learning Through the Integration of Formative Assessment and Democratic Teaching Beliefs

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Need to establish a system providing real-time feedback through formative assessments utilizing discussion boards, video lectures, and digital worksheets within an LMS

learning_goals: Learners can accurately diagnose their understanding of scientific concepts at 80% or higher by analyzing formative assessment results.
Learners can apply at least three specific types of feedback through peer assessment activities.
Teachers can design formative assessment items based on democratic teaching beliefs (respecting student diversity, growth mindset) with at least 70% alignment.
Learners can document at least two improvement points identified during the formative assessment process by writing weekly reflective journals.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
